channel.title: Changeing shop price and 2h weapons? help?
channel.description:
i want to have this weapon 2h but how?
[code]Item id: 15351 Saradomin sword Yo. 31232321 31232321 312323321 31 21 35 13 25 17 12 12 13 12 65 13 12 16 65 12 12[/code]
and this i want price to 400m
[code]item = 15332 Godsword shards a shard 400000000 400000000 400000000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8[/code]
in shop it says: !! NOT EXISTING ITEM !!! - id 15332: currently costs 1 coins but it doesnt work
